mapper.select: select u.userID, u.name, sum(i.creater = u.name) AS creation , sum(i.userID = u.userID) AS recived , sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待验证')) AS resolved, sum(i.creater = u.name and (i.issuestate = '已关闭')) AS closed, ifnull( concat( round( sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待验证')) / sum(i.userID = u.userID) *100), '%') ,'0%') AS completion from usertable u,issuetable i WHERE u.roleID = 0 GROUP BY u.userID

select u.userID, u.name, sum(i.creater = u.name ) AS creation , sum(i.userID = u.userID ) AS recived , sum(i.userID =u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待验证') ) AS resolved , sum(i.creater = u.name and (i.issuestate = '已关闭') )AS closed , ifnull( concat( round( sum(i.userID = u.userID and (i.issuestate = '待验证')) / sum(i.userID = u.userID) *100), '%') ,'0%') AS completion from usertable u,issuetable i
AND u.userID = #{userID}
AND u.name LIKE '%' #{name} '%'
